items.text: full and wide outside off, driven handsomely on the up past mid-off. Leans into this and uses his core strength as he springs while hitting this
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: walks down the track and guides this incoming ball to fine leg
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: walks at it again. Length ball just outside off and he wafts at it on the move. Thick outside edge wide of third man
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length and just outside off, beaten on the outside edge as he looks to defend on the front foot
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length just outside off, tapped into the covers on the front foot
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full and just outside off. Almost yorks himself with the stride and is forced to dig it out, but he does well enough to beat Cremer's dive at mid-off
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length in the corridor, allows it to come on and steers it to third man
items.postText: Ferdous C: "Shakib is bit tentative in 1st few overs, one he get passed this stage he is a treat to watch. And this game is heading toward to this as I can see. "
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on middle stump, nudged through square leg off the back foot
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Here's Blessing. One slip for him.
items.text: length ball fired in on a middle stump, lifts off the pitch and takes the leading edge as he closes the face too early
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, angling across the batsman. Gets deep in the crease and taps it to square leg
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length just outside off, driven on the up towards mid-off
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, defended square into the off side off the back foot
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, tapped to fine leg from the crease
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: ah ruins a good over. Length ball on leg stump. Tamim stays put in the crease with a half-stride, and tickles it fine
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.preText: Raza, around the wicket. Slip in place.
items.text: good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length and turning away from off stump, can't get this flick away against the turn. Dribbles back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle, hurriedly tapped to extra cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, punched to long-off off the back foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: floated full and down leg side. Tamim can't connect on the flick as this spins back in. Taylor doesn't anticipate the turn and it skids through from between his legs
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 5 wides

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended into the covers on the front foot
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length and just outside off. Tapped to point on the up
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length and just outside off, driven on the up to extra cover
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: sharp bouncer. A pity he's penalised for it. This spits up at Shakib and he's late as he swivels to try and hook. Resists in the end and watches it sail over his front shoulder
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide
